about_the_game:
SimuLOVE! is a choice-driven game where a single decision can change the outcome of the story.

You are a young programmer running your own studio. Your new hire, Alice, is helping you develop a new app called "SimuLOVE" - a dating simulator. Alice is very helpful and generally does everything (or almost everything) you ask. 😊

In addition to Alice, you are also in a relationship with your girlfriend, Jess. She can be a bit jealous and not always easy to deal with, but she is worth the effort. ❤️

Develop the app, get into trouble, and make choices that will determine the fate of all the characters. 🖥️💡

In this game, every choice matters. Each character has both good and bad endings, as well as some secret and side endings. There are various sexual scenes and a lot of nudity! The romantic interactions are integral to the story, shaping the relationships and outcomes for each character. Explore the complex dynamics between the characters and experience the highs and lows of love and passion. 🔀💘

Meet the cast!

Alice is a recent addition to your team and a gifted programmer whose talents were instrumental in the creation of SimuLOVE. Her sweet and accommodating nature makes her a joy to work with, and her dedication to her craft is truly inspiring. 🌟

Age: 22

Blood Type: A

Origin: New York, USA

Height: 165 cm

Weight: 55 kg

Sign: Leo ♌

Birthday: August 10 🎂

Jess, your current girlfriend, is a force to be reckoned with. As a high-ranking executive in the financial sector, she's no stranger to stress and handles it with a grace that's truly admirable. Her work ethic is unmatched, and her commitment to her career is as strong as her commitment to you. 💼💪

Age: 23

Blood Type: O

Origin: London, UK

Height: 170 cm

Weight: 60 kg

Sign: Libra ♎

Birthday: September 22 🎉

Yumi is an enigma, a mysterious figure whose path crossed with yours purely by chance. Her elusive nature only adds to her charm, and while you may not know much about her, you're drawn to the mystery that surrounds her. 🕵️‍♀️✨

Age: ???

Blood Type: ???

Origin: ???

Height: ??? cm

Weight: ??? kg

Sign: ???

Birthday: ??? 🎭

🌍Multilingual Support: Available in 🇺🇸 English, 🇧🇷 Português (Brasil), 🇨🇳 中文 (Chinese), 🇷🇺 русский (Russian).

🎯Choices Matter: Shape the protagonist's path and the fate of their groundbreaking simulator with every decision you make.

👥Meet Memorable Characters: Interact with a diverse cast, each with their own stories and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

🎨Anime-Inspired Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully illustrated scenes that capture the essence of modern anime aesthetics.

📖Narrative Depth: Explore themes of ambition, love, and the impact of technology on human connections through engaging storytelling.

🔞Mature Content: Experience an adult visual novel that delves into intimate and sensual themes, offering a bold exploration of human relationships and desires.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are adults. They work and have detailed individual characteristics such as age, birthdate, nationality, etc., available on the official developer website. The story is set in a workplace environment and unfolds sometimes into old age. There are various events where sexual interactions between characters may occur, including vaginal, anal, and multiple positions.

Content Warning:

The game contains explicit representations of sexual acts, including vaginal and anal intercourse, as well as various sexual positions. There are also mature themes related to adult relationships within a professional setting.

Players should be aware that the game may contain content that is sensitive or triggering, such as:

Representations of sexual acts and nudity.
Potentially explicit language.
Situations that could be interpreted as non-consensual or aggressive in nature.
Please refer to the official website for detailed information about character backgrounds and other content warnings.

detailed_description:
SimuLOVE! is a choice-driven game where a single decision can change the outcome of the story.

You are a young programmer running your own studio. Your new hire, Alice, is helping you develop a new app called "SimuLOVE" - a dating simulator. Alice is very helpful and generally does everything (or almost everything) you ask. 😊

In addition to Alice, you are also in a relationship with your girlfriend, Jess. She can be a bit jealous and not always easy to deal with, but she is worth the effort. ❤️

legal_notice:
End-User License Agreement (EULA) of SimuLOVE! Vol 1.
This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and LOVETech. Our EULA was created by EULA Template for SimuLOVE! Vol 1..

This EULA agreement governs your acquisition and use of our SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software ("Software") directly from LOVETech or indirectly through a LOVETech authorized reseller or distributor (a "Reseller").

Please read this EULA agreement carefully before completing the installation process and using the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software. It provides a license to use the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software and contains warranty information and liability disclaimers.

If you register for a free trial of the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software, this EULA agreement will also govern that trial. By clicking "accept" or installing and/or using the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software, you are confirming your acceptance of the Software and agreeing to become bound by the terms of this EULA agreement.

If you are entering into this EULA agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to these terms and conditions. If you do not have such authority or if you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this EULA agreement, do not install or use the Software, and you must not accept this EULA agreement.

This EULA agreement shall apply only to the Software supplied by LOVETech herewith regardless of whether other software is referred to or described herein. The terms also apply to any LOVETech updates, supplements, Internet-based services, and support services for the Software, unless other terms accompany those items on delivery. If so, those terms apply.

License Grant
LOVETech hereby grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-exclusive licence to use the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software on your devices in accordance with the terms of this EULA agreement.

You are permitted to load the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software (for example a PC, laptop, mobile or tablet) under your control. You are responsible for ensuring your device meets the minimum requirements of the SimuLOVE! Vol 1. software.

You are not permitted to:

Edit, alter, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise change the whole or any part of the Software nor permit the whole or any part of the Software to be combined with or become incorporated in any other software, nor decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer the Software or attempt to do any such things
Reproduce, copy, distribute, resell or otherwise use the Software for any commercial purpose
Allow any third party to use the Software on behalf of or for the benefit of any third party
Use the Software in any way which breaches any applicable local, national or international law
use the Software for any purpose that LOVETech considers is a breach of this EULA agreement
Intellectual Property and Ownership
LOVETech shall at all times retain ownership of the Software as originally downloaded by you and all subsequent downloads of the Software by you. The Software (and the copyright, and other intellectual property rights of whatever nature in the Software, including any modifications made thereto) are and shall remain the property of LOVETech.

LOVETech reserves the right to grant licences to use the Software to third parties.

Termination
This EULA agreement is effective from the date you first use the Software and shall continue until terminated. You may terminate it at any time upon written notice to LOVETech.

It will also terminate immediately if you fail to comply with any term of this EULA agreement. Upon such termination, the licenses granted by this EULA agreement will immediately terminate and you agree to stop all access and use of the Software. The provisions that by their nature continue and survive will survive any termination of this EULA agreement.

Governing Law
This EULA agreement, and any dispute arising out of or in connection with this EULA agreement, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of br.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A

name: SimuLOVE! Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A

short_description: You’re a successful programmer developing "SimuLOVE," a dating app, with the help of your new and seductive assistant. On top of that, you try to balance your professional and personal life with Jess, your workaholic girlfriend, while navigating the ups and downs of your love life.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Korean, Japanese
